archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Horizon Business Services [HBS]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
https://poluk.sharepoint.com/sites/SolutionDesignDocuments/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FSolutionDesignDocuments%2FShared%20Documents%2FHLDs%2FHBS%20%2D%20Horizon%20Business%20Server&p=true&ct=1655977216579&or=OWA%2DNT&cid=913a9ef8%2D6a98%2D8ef3%2D980c%2Da4424983a61b&ga=1 Horizon Business Services. This provides the ARTS compliant interface with Horizon (including self-service kiosk)
ARTS: ARTS XML Retail Transaction Interface Technical Specification v1.0 25/12/2007
The interface is defined in [REQ/APP/AIS/1794]. It can be split into 2 parts: 1. Basket/Transaction Services 2. Non-Basket/Transaction Services
The server also hosts other services such as link to CDP, British Gas etc
